Title: Licorice
Overview: Licorice root has been used in traditional medicine but can affect cardiovascular health.

OtherSections.Safety: Consult healthcare provider before use, especially with pre-existing conditions.
OtherSections.AdverseEffects: May cause Hypertension, Arrhythmia, Heart failure, Bradycardia. Can lead to pseudoaldosteronism with cardiac effects.
OtherSections.Effectiveness: Clinical evidence varies. Consult medical literature for specific conditions.
OtherSections.Dosing&Administration: Follow healthcare provider recommendations or product labeling.
OtherSections.InteractionswithDrugs: May interact with multiple medications. Consult healthcare provider.
OtherSections.InteractionswithSupplements: May interact with other supplements. Use caution.
OtherSections.InteractionswithConditions: Contraindicated in Hypertension, Heart failure, Arrhythmia, Cardiovascular disease. Monitor blood pressure carefully.
OtherSections.InteractionswithLabTests: May affect certain laboratory test results.
OtherSections.Overdose: Seek immediate medical attention if overdose suspected.
OtherSections.Pharmacokinetics: Pharmacokinetic data may be limited for herbal products.
OtherSections.MechanismofAction: Mechanism of action varies by substance and may not be fully understood.
